trends: There have been no other sightings in Otego
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsthis report is being submitted on behalf the witness, at his request, by *(name deleted--cms\sg). 10\22\10-received call from witnes who had obtained my phone number from **name deleted--cms\sg. witness reported seeing a ufo in the northern sky, approximately 300 feet over the tree line, nearly every night for the last two months. he stated that what he saw was boomerang shaped and yellow in color. on one occassion he noticed a rotating red light under the yellow light. the sighting occur usually about 7:15 or so each evening, however as time has progressed they have come later. the object is now visible after 8:00 and remains so until dawn. he stated that it is not visible if it is raining, but he has observed it on cloudy nights..
Summary: Light(s) seen in northern sky almost nightly since approx july 2010
